item.title: 希拉里-斯万克（Hilary Swank）说，抚养一对双胞胎 Aya 和 Ohm 是 "我一生中最大的快乐"。这位 49 岁的演员在去年 4 月宣布了她的 "两个奇迹 "的诞生。她与艾伦-里奇森（Alan Ritchson）合作主演了《平凡天使》（Ordinary Angels）。
item.description:
Hilary Swank says raising twins Aya and Ohm has been "the greatest joy of my life." The 49-year-old actor announced the birth of her "two miracles" last April. She stars in “Ordinary Angels” alongside Alan Ritchson. pic.twitter.com/bZ72zj3XhK

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 23, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 警方称，他们已经确认了一名佐治亚州护理专业学生死亡事件的 "嫌疑人"，并正在对其进行讯问。这名 22 岁的学生周四被发现死于佐治亚大学校园内，在此之前，她的一位朋友告诉警方，她晨跑后没有回来。
item.description:
Police say they have identified and are questioning a “person of interest” in the death of a Georgia nursing student.

The 22-year-old was found dead on the University of Georgia campus Thursday after a friend told police she had not returned from a morning run. pic.twitter.com/ZyZK42KVSJ

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 23, 2024
